metadata.title: CVE-2021-20178 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A flaw was found in ansible module where credentials are disclosed in the console log by default and not protected by the security feature when using the bitbucket_pipeline_variable module. This flaw allows an attacker to steal bitbucket_pipeline credentials. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to confidentiality.

criterions.comment: ansible package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
